portal-page.name: Orders Clinician Home Page
portal-page.description: Home page to be used for pilot group involved with orders production implementation. This is a workaround to avoid the permissions denied messgae being displayed on Users Home pages that dont have access. This is a copy of Clinician Homepage. When all clincians require access this home page should be removed and Clincian Homepage will be updated to include the orders windowlets.
